solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public int findMaximumXOR(int[] nums) {--newline--        int max = 0, mask = 0;--newline--        for(int i = 31; i >= 0; i--){--newline--            mask = mask | (1 << i);--newline--            Set<Integer> set = new HashSet<>();--newline--            for(int num : nums){--newline--                set.add(num & mask);--newline--            }--newline--            int tmp = max | (1 << i);--newline--            for(int prefix : set){--newline--                if(set.contains(tmp ^ prefix)) {--newline--                    max = tmp;--newline--                    break;--newline--                }--newline--            }--newline--        }--newline--        return max;--newline--    }--newline--}--newline--
